name: Bebo's Big Adventure
description:
A short game about Bebo made using Shaun Spaldings ARPG tutorial! Unfortunately you can't delete save files as of now but its a very short game.  Almost all the art was done myself. All music and sound effects were done myself.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Roll/Activate: Space

Attack: Shift

Use Item: Control

Cycle Items: Q/E

Pause: ESC

Font by Daniel Linssen
https://managore.itch.io/
